h1: How Many Calories in Little Caesars Pizza?
assumptions: Classic Cheese Pizza, large (14-inch), per slice (1/8 pizza), as served without extra toppings.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Little Caesars Classic Cheese Pizza contains about 280 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: About 280 kcal for a slice of Classic Cheese Pizza.

faqs.q: What are the macros in Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Per slice: 36 g carbs, 12 g protein, 10 g fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in a whole Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Around 2,240 kcal for a large Classic Cheese (8 slices).

faqs.q: Does Little Caesars pizza have high sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 560 mg per slice due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How do toppings affect calories in Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Pepperoni adds ~40 kcal per slice; veggies add fewer calories.
